Review title: POPCORN EMPIRE: Ready or Not - Movie Review
Review_body: "Ready or Not is... a crazy, off-the-wall film that feels refreshing among the many sequels and reboots of this year." 8.5/10Ready or Not is a horror-comedy starring Samara Weaving, Adam Brody, and Henry Czerney. The film is packed with plenty gory action and dark humor, with a dash of socio-political commentary. it's a crazy, off-the-wall film that feels refreshing among the many sequels and reboots of this year.Warning: Spoilers Ahead!When Grace (Samara Weaving) and Alex Le Domas (Mark O'Brien) host their wedding at the Le Domas family mansion, things quickly take a turn for the weird. Once the wedding ceremony is over, Alex explains to Grace that she must play a game as part of family tradition. After Alex's father Tony (Henry Czerney) fills us in on some of the family history, Grace is presented with a small black box full of cards. When Grace pulls a card from the box, the game will be revealed. As luck would have it, Grace randomly selects the one possibility that the whole family was dreading: "Hide and Seek".This is no ordinary game of hide and seek. Grace must hide within the mansion until dawn, while the Le Domas family hunts her down and tries to kill her as part of a twisted ritual. Arming themselves with old rifles, crossbows, knives, etc. the De Lomas's reluctantly begin their hunt. Grace is not informed of the details, believing this to all be a silly game - until she witnesses one of the maids being killed in an unfortunate accident. At this point, Grace realizes she's trapped in a tense game of survival as she tries to out-maneuver and outsmart the Le Domas family.Much of the humor comes from the De Lomas's who, despite being the antagonists of this story, are merely hunting Grace out of obligation. Half of them barely know how to use their weapons (one even takes an extended bathroom break to watch YouTube videos about crossbows), and even more simply want the whole affair over with, silently believing that the ritual is made-up nonsense. This anti-trope results in a lot of back-and-forth bickering and petty insults being passed around, and it's hilarious watching these characters struggle and fail to kill Grace time and time again. While the dialogue isn't always polished, there's plenty of funny lines and situational humor, as well as over-the-top violence and gore. If you have the stomach for both bloody violence and gallows humor, this film is right up your alley.Grace is resourceful, witty, and charming, and she makes for a very compelling and like-able lead. Many members of the De Lomas family are intentionally portrayed as out-of-touch, clueless, rotten, psychopathic, or all of the above, making it all the more satisfying when Grace gets the upper hand on them. Samara Weaving gives a terrific and layered performance, showing bravery and resolve when need be, but also embodying the trauma and hysteria of the situation at the most crucial moments, especially when the film reaches its (literally) explosive climax. She's an innocent, seemingly harmless bride turned badass "girl power" action hero, and her transformation throughout the movie is immensely satisfying to watch, especially when someone in the De Lomas family gets their comeuppance (in the form of a gruesome death).Ready or Not clocks in at a tightly paced 95 minutes, having fun with its premise without stretching it for too long. The film constantly has its foot on the gas, keeping its momentum going with humorous gags and well-executed action sequences. The plot is fast paced and consistently engaging thanks to the efficient editing.This is not a film for everyone, but it's wonderfully subversive and well-crafted. While it's reminiscent of other horror-comedies such as Get Out and You're Next, Ready or Not has a distinct style of its own. It's likely one of the most fun moviegoing experiences you'll have all year.8.5/10
This movie was action packed fun from beginning to end! I love how they ended the movie in a non-cliche horror movie way.
This was funny. Actings a little wooden in places but still funny. No plot but it doesnt need one. The graphics are good. Not much of a script but it wasn't really needed.

Review title: I wish there was a way to weed out malicious reviews.
Review_body: This movie is a horror comedy. It does reinvent the wheel but it is original, funny and gory enough to entertain. It won't scare you so bad that you'll require therapy or suffer a moral injury for seeing it but there are some laugh out loud moments. My wife and I felt it was a well spent hour and a half.

I saw the preview during another movie and thought this was a horror movie. During the first few minutes I I quickly realized it was a comedy horror. Nice surprise for me because I am typically not a horror fan. This definitely helps keep it interesting and funny. Not hilarious but it's not supposed to be. The blood and gore keeps it horror for sure. Samara Weaving absolutely killed it. I mean she really makes you believe what you're seeing is really happening to her, fantastic acting!

In this movie you will be on the edge of your seat from the beginning.
I loved the comedy sense in the movie, made it even more outstanding.

The people who are giving this pile of pig slop 9's and 10's need to get a grip...
They say things like, "refreshingly original", or "great bit of fun", when in fact, it's not any of those... The Hunt, even though an astounding piece of crap in it's own right, was better than this trash. Honestly, it's almost 2 hours of you're life you'll never get back.
And what about the guns??? The butler tells her, when she clicks an empty barrelled shot gun at him, that the ammo is just for display, but all the other guns in the room had real ammo...so stupid. Then when he tracks her down and she manages to choke him out, before she steals his car, she doesnt grab the gun he had??? Yes, yes, l know it was a tranquilizer, but it would still be an asset right?
This movie is a complete dumpster fire from start to finish, and the only reason l actually finished this garbage was so l could write an honest and sincere review so as to warn off the next people who think this shameful drivel will be entertaining...

Just saw it with my daughter and granddaughter. Since the trailers gave a pretty good idea of how the story goes we were not unready for the plot. Still, it had some pretty good sequences, resulting in some comedic horror that took us by surprise. Yeah, Grace screamed a lot, where she shouldn't have, but hey - she had good reasons to. Samara Weaving did a superb job of conveying her terror.P.S. Did anyone else think of "Mars Attacks" at the end of this film?
I found it original if you saw the trailer what did you expect to see

This movies just a straight up fun time. It's a case of a movie that takes a cool and interesting premise and just runs with it, making for a wildly entertaining experience. It's definitely flawed, with several recurring tropes and plot conveniences but for the most part that doesn't hold it back too much since it's still a good time despite them. So, it might not be particularly memorable or have any sort of potent messages but it doesn't really matter because it's a lot of fun and just a good time overall.
Was so intense and scary. Samara Weaving was awesome in it. And in the end it was funny but satisfying all at the same time.

Review title: Loved it so much I pre-order the DVD
Review_body: This is a great movie to see. It gave suspense and laughter all at once. When you first watch it you're thinking the same thing Grace is, this is just a fun night of Hide and go seek what could go wrong and then everything is wrong. I love the dynamic between everyone and I truly wanted Grace to get out of that house alive. This movie knows exactly what it is and does not try to make you think anything else. Grace is a badass!!! I pre-order the movie so I can watch it again and again

Review title: So much better that I expected!
Review_body:
I was either grossed out, giggling, cheering, or nervous throughout. Just a fun ride start to finish.
Most of the cast was quite good, if a bit one dimensional. But that's to be expected. Great lead, 2-3 very solid performances.
Fun gore!

Review title: Quite good, but not great certainly not a classic.
Review_body: Ok so this is a black comedy not a horror film. It was listed under the horror section for 2019.I just feel although not a bad movie as such, it should have been a more serious, darker, creepier movie and it THEN would have been a gem.Why not have it so that when the butler was strangled for example they came back as an actual demon type scary monster? They could have done so much more with this film. I know I'm 37 years old going on 12 but what happened to all the scary creepy movies from the 80/90's!!!???So the story is quite linear, it's predictable, it thinks it's funnier than it actually is, but it gave me a couple of chuckles here and there and the acting was quite reasonable. It was averagely well written and the ending was pretty good.The star, the main character (younger brother) and the older brother did a good job (re acting).Overall worth a watch and a lot better than the usual standard fare there putting out these days.Thanks Mad, 🙂👍

Review title: Solid film, but falls short of perfection
Review_body: I really enjoyed this film for what it was. They use suspense and dark humor well here to keep you guessing who you can trust. I was able to guess the big plot twist (family motivation) prior to the reveal which made it less impacting. Characters are.....ok. Don't come here looking for a deep plot either. Just enjoy the insanity!

This movie is fun and fast paced, a fun ride from beginning to end that keeps you on the edge of your seat. I've watched it several times now and although I watch it any time of year, it will be a go-to every October. Not enough people know about this gem. Watch it!
Cool idea, fun plot and great acting. Perfect for a pizza party with friends, very entertaining.
I was expecting a horror movie, or a thriller. Not a comedy

Was not expecting much with this movie, but boy did it catch me off guard. If you are a pretentious movie goer and need realistic build up to what I thought was a great ending then you are probably going to be with the many that have rated this a 1 or a 2. If you are looking to indulge in just a fun thriller / horror comedy then I think you will be pleasantly surprised much like myself. Think Clue meets your next with a sprinkle of Satanic Sacrifice. I think any fan of the horror / thriller genre will enjoy this breathe of fresh air from all the other movies out there pumping you with cheap jump scares for 90 minutes.A possible cult classic is on our hands!
Thought it was a decent flick. Those who like the dark strange humor stuff will enjoy it. It was above average for that genre. It was comical to me.

"Bride" + the ending = 7/10.
How important It is to have an Oscar-level uncle in family!

The movie's storyline began really great. To be part of the family they have to play a game which is chosen by a little box. It turns out to be hide and seek. The bride not knowing a thing is hiding and the family is planning on killing her. Her husband helps her hiding so they cant take her. It was all nice and fun to watch at but what happened with the ending? They really messed up there because the ending was some kind of magical thing and destroyed the whole movie. The family sold their souls to the devil to get all this fortune and because they cant complete their mission (killing the bride) they all imploded. Absolutely nonsense

But not for everyone. As others have said, this is definitely not a 1-2 star movie. Objectively higher quality than that. It's not really a horror movie. It's a suspense movie where the gruesome scenes are intentionally absurd. For me it worked. Sort of "if Sam Raimi made a suspense movie early in his career." It greatly exceeded my expectations.

Ready or Not has a great story, music and great acting, in my opinion the "Terror" category shouldn't be on this movie. The movie doesn't lose its quality over time what makes us, spectators, to watch it till the end with a curiosity that we can't leave.

I would have liked this movie more if it were more serious, if it didn't have a silly plot & if it had more more action/ horror scenes. It has potential but simply put, it ended up being a silly, dumb & stupid movie which I'd never watch again. I wouldn't discourage anyone from watching it though.
If u like Horror comedy like Zombieland than its a Go for u.

Review title: I thought it was really good
Review_body: The movie does a perfect job of keeping you entertained. There is the right amount of horror, thrill and comedy in it. Acting from the cast is spectacular too, makes you really feel the emotions they're feeling. Each of the characters are very well written, they all have certain layers to them that unfolds throughout. Many people thought the ending was tacky, I thought it was really funny and just what the movie needed to be fair. I thoroughly enjoyed it, it's definitely worth a go if you're looking for some thrill and fun.

Weaving was great. Screamed like a banshee at times and you could really feel the pain and confusion betrayed. The shoulder roll at the end of the movie was a fantastic move. Ending was quite surprising. Too many nothing characters but Daniel and Grace were really good.

This movie is Brilliant! I put it on one evening without knowing a thing about it and was totally caught off guard. It's gory, edge of the seat and funny when you least expect it. Huge fan of of this movie and have watched it several times!

Review title: I loved it! tense and lot of fun
Review_body: I'm glad that somebody made the family going down kind of movie in funny but brutally thrilling way, it's a very delicious slice of bloody cake that you wont get enough that easy, enjoy! Thumbs up for Samara, she's a badass🤘🏻

The ending did it for me I liked it up until the end then it was just so stupid I got pissed off and hated the film. It would have been better for Grace to have killed everyone. The ending was just dumb.

After watching the trailer and liking it, I have been looking forward to watch this movie, wasn't expecting much, but I'm too glad I was wrong! Although you get glimpses of what to expect in the trailer, the cinematography, production design, story telling and acting is worth the whole 1 1/2 hours of madness. The whole plot of the movie revolved around Samara's character and she played her part in an immaculate manner. Round of applause for doing that as her acting and dialogue delivery is the reason that kept the movie together. The movie never felt as a B grade thriller. It genuinely invested in the whole game we witnessed. The supporting actors are well casted. Blood and gore made it somewhat not kids friendly, yet more enjoyable as the stakes are much higher. The climax of the movie is such a rollercoaster of a ride. I liked the turn of events and the dark comedic touches they added throughout the movie. Especially the dialogue at the end is like one of the most perfect and badass ending I have seen since long. You can't stop smiling of what the hell just happened. A very well balanced movie! I have a feeling it's going to become a cult classic in the coming years.. Bravo for the whole team!

Not gonna lie, the concept seemed interesting and original with potential. However, execution was terrible. It starts off well with proper horror vibes that kept me on the edge of my seat right until the first 'accidental' death of one of the maids. It was at this point that I knew it was going downhill. By the time they got to the third maid's death, I was ready to leave.The excessive comic relief scenes were completely unnecessary and made me cringe. I still don't get how/why movies try to incorporate comedy in horror films because they're two conflicting genres that defeat each other's purpose. What's worse is that the characters were extremely unfunny and the deaths were ridiculous, therefore taking away the fright factor (if it existed).But the worst part has got to be the ending. So they were right all along and as a result, they all died in a comical way? Ha ha? We barely got to see any kills in the movie. Why kill all these characters in one stupid scene instead of using them to make a good horror film with several separate deaths.Overall, the movie was absolute garbage. Seemed like a mix of Get Out and the Cabin in the Woods but A LOT worse. All the high ratings are probably from teenagers or people with low IQs that find comedic horror films 'entertaining'.

You know, I enjoy b rate movies and expect them to be bad. I watched this and still don't know how so many people rated this failing so highly. Don't believe it was bad? Save your money and watch it here.

Review title: You really have to stretch your imagination on this one.
Review_body:
First of all the plot itself is a far reach to begin with. A family who made their millions with board games and sports teams with the help of Satan. Okay chew on that. Now, you have the bride, quite literally the dumbest character in the whole movie I almost rooted for her to die. There were two instances where she could have grabbed a gun from her attacker on two separate occasions but she didn't. One of these attackers was a 7 year old boy. She knocked the little boy out and completely dismissed the gun she just got shot with.
Apart from her being so dumb, surprisingly she was the only good actor in the whole movie with perhaps Adam Brody being a close second. Everyone else felt forced specially the old lady who relied heavily on her wardrobe and makeup to come across as an evil b-word. Her acting was forced and cringey.
I watched this movie because it seemed like a fresh new idea. Boy was I wrong. I rather watch hunger games again.
After 20 mins i forced myself to keep watching. I lasted 50 mins and then closed it!

Review title: A Bloody Good Time to Be Had
Review_body: I see this film as a general attack on groupthink and dangerous justifications for preserving a status quo built upon a literal Faustian bargain. Attacking rich people for being rich is dangerous. The villains could've easily been a family of redneck cannibal Appalachians.

A bride marrying into a wealthy family is forced into a deadly game of hide and seek.I put this movie on late at night, thinking to view it in installments but could not stop until the end.Samara Weaving is perfectly charming as the wary bride, and the rest of the cast give spot-on performances mixing zaniness with menace.The script, never short of black humor, deftly shows rather than tells, and will touch many a nerve in this age of systemic inequality. But it's about more than just wealth, or impunity. It's also heaps of clever fun. Can you spot all the game references? Even though the end may seem manufactured, on second thought, it's true to form.Two stars off for the gruesome moments.

I sometimes watch movies like this to kill time. I don't nit pick small details as I know it is not a documentary. It filled its function for me.A plus is that In the credits there was no scene letting you know there was an evil survivor denying you the satisfaction of knowing evil was defeated. Hollywood is so incapable of coming up with new plots that they recycle even second rate movies that barely make a profit. Having so called franchise movies with toys and video games seem to be the main goal these days.Been there and seen it. Sequels are always nosier and louder than the original and crappier,.It occupied a couple of empty hours.

Murderous game of hide and seek
A surprising ending to a satanic of a ride.

Murderous game of hide and seek
A surprising ending to a satanic and savage ride.

People should understand the fact that these kind of movies are time killers, made only for enjoyment, and not enlightenment, when you go into a movie like this expecting some kind of great mind bending plot, of course you'll be disappointed, it is a light comedy-horror movie, and done.The movie in itself was good, good acting by the main character, good suspense throughout the movie and satisfying ending.

Review title: Fun, campy horror like Cabin in the Woods
Review_body: Switch your brain off and enjoy the rollercoaster ride that is this movie. The cast are super fun and good calibre. It is campy, obvious but hilarious from start to finish. We giggled all the way through. It was like Revenge the TV show meets Get Out meets Dead Man on Campus with a sprinkle of The OC.
I am writing this just for this stunning movie and stunning cast members. It's funny, hilarious, and the great thing is that it is not boring

Review title: Samara Weaving Delivers an Amazing Performance
Review_body: This is an incredibly fun horror flick. Easily one of the best in the genera. This movie is almost as good as Zombieland.
Good movie with a nice pace to it. Lots of fun things going on with some very unexpected twists and turns. Enjoyed it all the way through.

Review title: Such an amazing smart horror movie
Review_body: The cast, the direction, the script and the music leads us to enjoy one of the best horror movies from last decade.It is really smart and worthy to watch.These directors and Samara deserve much more credit.
Looks like the rich didn't like the movie and we all wonder why
LOVED this movie. It kept you on your toes and was the perfect mix of horror and comedy. AND a movie with an ending I liked? Those are hard to find nowadays. Bravo.

With all these remakes and 10-15yrs sequels to movies, it feels good that someone popped an original GOOD (not worth to watch) but GOOD movie! It's like these producers, directors, and screenwriters or scared to be original!The movie was equally balanced in the genre! Got my wife to even sit down and watch it with me and she even enjoyed it! And she dont even go for movies like this! Now I will say this, I wouldn't had spend $11 to watch it on the big, but if it was an Netflix Original and me seeing the trailer for it, I would of been anxiously waiting for it to drop!

Review title: Wait for it to come on TV
Review_body: Oh dear. What a silly film.Poor girl marries into rich family who have a ritual for anyone joining the family to play a randomly selected game. Poor Grace gets the 'Hide and Seek' card, which means the rich folk (including young grade school age kids) hunt her with the intent to kill her.The film started quite earnestly in trying to be a creepy weirdo family house of horrors and rapidly descended into vacuous exhibition of digital gore. People in the cinema were laughing out loud most of the way through, and not in a good way!I only went to see this as an Odeon 'screen unseen' in the U.K. and because I have a cinema pass. If I had paid my £14 for a ticket, I would have been very unhappy about it. As it was, my companions got in for £5 each, which is all this film is worth.If you've seen a genuinely scary film, you'll want to give this a miss. The moniker of 'comedy' is more apt than 'suspense, horror, thriller' as shown on IMDb.Save yourself the money, and have a giggle at this when it arrives on satellite TV.

This movie is exactly one of the reasons why I don't watch so-called horror movies. From the start till the end everything is so absurd and doesn't make sense. It's a story of an unfortunate girl who marries a guy from a rich family. The family made their fortune by creating and producing board games and all those stuff.Every time, at midnight after the wedding ceremony takes places, this family has a ritual in which they play a board game.
This time, they play hide and seek and the goal is to kill the bride. (Let's kill the bride, what's more fun than that seriously?)The story was unusual from the beginning when the creepy aunt Helene was introduced. But anyway, I know it's a comedy movie but it wasn't a very cogent one. Everything is so absurd not in a funny way, but rather in a silly way.The absurdity is that they wanna kill the bride joyfully with pride but when they shoot another random person they feel sorry for them. The plots are replete with so many stupid and illogical scenes. To compound the stupidity, a little kid has a gun and tries to kill the bride. Later he was asked why you shot her & he replies "that's what everyone else was trying to do". But he was in his room from the beginning and he had no idea what was going on, so how does he know about the game?"Ready or not" is regarded by some viewers as a laudable and fantastic movie, which sounds so ridiculous to me. At the end, I really detest this movie and I don't really recommend such foolish story.

Review title: Funny and well worth a watch.
Review_body: The Mrs and I really enjoyed this film, the ONLY reason it didn't get a 10 from us is the 'Omini Domini' fake latin schpeal, it might have been an attempt at a joke but it fell flat.Some great laugh out loud moments and the horror effects are spot on.The ending was just brilliant, well done to the film makers for keeping us entertained throughout the whole film.

It's one of those movies that you can rewatch and have a fun time Finally!! It keeps on your sit and have a fun ending Samara Weaving is a New Scream Queen,love her acting This movie doesn't rake itself seriously and that's what fun about it Could be the new Scream Thank god the director of this also did Scream 5 You know what I give this a 10 For how bad and not my taste's the last year's scary movies were Yeap this movie gets a 10 And becomes an instant classic
Poor execution with mixing horror and dark comedy. The story had potential but it failed.
Loved it. Dark exciting and funny a must watch. Great acting

The dark humour and the great acting of the main character is what makes this movie for me. It's original and has an interesting but not complicated plot and is very fun to watch (recommend for the spooky season :))

Review title: Samara Weaving leads ensemble cast in bloodthirsty comedy - great
Review_body:
Being rich seems easy. All you have to do is sell your soul to Satan, make the occasional human sacrifice, and money and privilege are your forever. Unless the latest victim turns out to be the final girl from hell, in which case the whole house of cards falls apart and burns to the ground.
Ready or Not is one of the last releases from Fox Searchlight Pictures, keeping its remit of high quality, low budget film production going right to the end. The film creates a fresh story from familiar ingredients as grace, played by the charismatic Samara Weaving, marries Alex and meets his rich family. She soon learns that tradition comes first with old-money types, as she spends her wedding night being hunted around the family mansion by her new in-laws with a variety of antique weapons. Not that they intend to kill her this early - that comes later when, after maiming and capturing her, they sacrifice her to Satan.
The family fortune comes from selling games of chance and the opening image shows Satan's grinning face surrounded by dice, playing cards, and a roulette wheel in a nice graphical foreshadowing of the story, where it is revealed that the le Domus family really do have a deal with the Devil. Each new family member has to pick a card at midnight, pick the wrong one and they must be hunted and sacrificed before dawn, with dreadful consequences for the family if they fail.
The ensemble cast is a major reason Ready or Not is so watchable. Samara Weaving takes us with her all the way from living the dream to surviving the nightmare; Alex is ambiguous right to the end, veering one way then the other in his wife vs family dilemma, we can see both sides of his guilt in a well-balanced performance from Mark O'Brien. His brother Daniel is full of drunken loathing for himself and the family, will he sober up in time to do the right thing? His wife Charity is the anti-Grace, fiercely committed to the family that has rescued her from some unspecified hellish past. Alex's sister Emilie is a ditzy cokehead who shouldn't be let near a tin opener, let alone a gun, her husband is a lazy chancer who married a rich girl so he would never have to get a job. Old aunt Helene, deliciously played by Nicky Guadagni, is demonic and bitter to the core, but also the funniest character in the film. Henry Czerny is the oddly sympathetic patriarch, his long-suffering demeanour a symptom of his ultimate responsibility for, literally, keeping the family alive. Andi McDowell is still a class act, although she doesn't have much to do. John Ralston completes the main cast, playing the family butler as part accomplice, part concentration camp guard. All the characters are given room to exist, with just enough dialogue and sharp observation to bring them to life.
Much credit goes to the directors and scriptwriters. They have all created a film that encompasses comedy, horror, and thriller while keeping a consistent tone and packing in a lot of action. Let's hope the demise of Fox Searchlight doesn't make it more difficult to produce smaller budget, well-crafted films like this.

Samara Weaving has a potent scream. She's also an excellent actor. Now combine that with some great talent in front of and behind the camera and our gift is this excellent, hilarious film.There is intense fire, and so many cringe (in a good way-the nail sequence in the barn) moments. I've seen this several times and love sharing it with people who haven't.Definitely in the highly successful vein of "Tucker and Dale Vs Evil" and "You're Next".

Review title: Fun horror comedy that doesn't take itself too seriously.
Review_body: This film certainly doesn't break any new ground, but if horror comedies are your thing, then this is a perfect popcorn movie for a rainy evening in. Once the set-up is done, it's basically just one long chase movie, where the crazed in-laws of a newly married bride attempt to hunt her down in a deadly game of hide & seek. Samara Weaving turns in a very good performance in the lead role, effectively portraying the change from lovestruck innocent to bad-ass, battle weary heroine. There's plenty of gory violence & gags to keep audiences interested, although it's never that genuinely scary or tense - but because it doesn't take itself too seriously, it gets away with it. A decent supporting cast with the likes of Adam Brody and Andie MacDowell seem to be having a lot of fun with the material and while it's not in the same class as say an Evil Dead II or Shaun of the Dead, there's still a lot to enjoy.

Review title: Annoying and so derivative you can see the last line coming from the very beginning of the game
Review_body:
You think this is a bizarre premise at first, but once you finally accept it and try to enjoy the dark comedy, all the cleverness is already gone and you know exactly how it is going to go (excepting perhaps the second to last scene, which I assume was the genesis for this script) as the constant and inexplicably bad decisions of the lead character amount to nothing more than a distractingly gory slasher flick posing thinly as a comedy that gets more and more annoying and predictible with every passing moment. As soon as the lead tears her dress up, you can guess exactly what the final line of the film is going to be and the pathetic lame joke she is going to make. The more I think about it, the more infuriating and derivative this whole thing is. But, at least there is that 2nd to last scene to bolster the film as a comedy.Bryan tyler does his best at an obnoxiously ironic "comedy" score mixed with dark string ostinatos and some nice orchestral moments and atmosphere.With that being said, the acting and directing are also actually very good, but it's just a slasher flick at the Bilderbergs house. Or the Vanderbilt's. Or Soros? Or whatever...Spoiler:
At one point the family drinks hydrochloric acid and is somehow fine 5 minutes later. It is infuriating. Why even write this in the script? It is so frustrating...

Review title: Ending Is Fun... The Rest? Meh
Review_body:
This is a so-so movie. It doesn't work as a horror movie. It's not funny as a comedy. The characters are one-dimensional.
But... the ending is funny and unexpected so it redeemed itself a little.
Excellent sample of how b movies should be. And when we say b movie we mean blood, gore and fun.

Review title: Stupid! Not funny! But definitely horrible!
Review_body: Just when you think a movie can't get any worse, it does. This was the epitome of horrible acting and horrible plot! If you thought it was good maybe it's time to reevaluate your tastes in life. Perfect trash.... what a waste of time!

Excellent movie, laugh non stop, shot in Beautiful Toronto and surrounding area. I have visited 2 times the Casa Loma too. Great characters.This kind of movies are nicely welcomed too. Soundtrack nice too. Movie that I will keep in my movie collection.

I try to give the benefit of the doubt till 1:07:00 when I can support a weak character escaping by the hands of the screenwriters without self effort or developing, "You're Next" (2011) overcome easily this movie. Sad for wasting my time couldn't watch till the end, Can´t afford weak main characters.

This movie gives you mix of feelings just like if you watched your brother slipped on stairs, first you'll freak out then you'll laugh. Lower your expectations from this movie and watch it just to entertain
I have lost important time of my life watching this movie - If you want to watch something better, then choose to look at wall paint dry...!!!

Its a brilliant cult classic!!
Its on rhw lines of midsommar... A psych thriller... Only difference is the dark humour..
Didn't see surviving movie for a while this movie is great but don't think too much. Just cheer her to survive.
This should be a formulaic, fairly boring, splatter movie but actually its a very well written, well acted, scary, funny film. Highly recommended!

Review title: The Death of Quality Thriller-Comedies is Here
Review_body:
What did I just watch?For a thriller/comedy, there were no thrills or laughs to be had. There was never a moment of tension. There was nothing even remotely close to humor. I think it was attempting to make social commentary of the lifestyles of the super-rich, but completely failed in that regard too.The protagonist is the most braindead character I have seen in decades. She does the opposite of basic human instinct at every possible opportunity."It's a game, there are rules we must follow."
*family proceeds to change the rules every step of the way*Save yourself the time and loss of brain cells. There are no redeeming qualities to be found here.

I came out of the cinema with a huge smile on my face. This is the kind of film I have been craving. Big spooky house, some brilliant build ups, no unnecessary jump scares and some great comedy!When the film started I had no idea of the comedy aspect and was really pleasantly surprised by it. This film is seriously funny but also gives me the horror fix that I need.I felt more satisfied leaving after this film than I did IT Chapter 2. Maybe that's because I expected IT 2 to be incredible?2 bad points with this film...Acting is just a little bit short of perfect, not from Samara Weaving though, she was incredible (defo want to see more of her). And the special effects at the end we too obvious that it was CGI.I would recommend this film to everyone

Review title: Feels like a good long trailer
Review_body: For me the movie the movie was good, but felt like a big letdown. When I watched the trailer I was so excited to go watch the movie. But when I saw it at the end I was not as hyped up as I was in the trailer. Some bad things about the movie was that some of the characters were pushed in and the ending was pretty dull. Some good things about the movie was that in my opinion they created a good atomsphere and they devolped the characters really well. Well I hoped you liked the review, I'll be back with another movie soon.

Review title: Fun Movie. Better than Get out.
Review_body: Cinematography, Acting, Dialogue, Flow and Energy, Direction was all there. You are going to get Grade A directing with B movie like story. I enjoyed this movie and would see again. I clicked this movie when i saw Margot Robbie on the cover art only to discover it wasn't her, but a doppelganger. She proved to be a good draw as did everyone else including Adam Brody, Andy McDowell, Henry Czerny.Only gripes I had were the servants being involved and killed by accident. When I see these movies, I allow myself to be absorbed into whatever world they are presenting, but the director still has to be honest and with hired help involved in ritual killing, I couldn't buy into it. But with that said, it was only one strike, and I didn't see any other strikes for me to negate this movie.8/10

Review title: Good mix of horror and dark comedy
Review_body: The cast did a pretty good job acting despite their average resumes. A good balance of horror and dark comedy.

Review title: Fun and quite exciting to watch
Review_body: If you love gore and violence, this is a move to watch. Yet, it is more than just gore. It has some plot in it that keeps you wondering how this is all going to end. This is a survival game for the lead female character. The way that she keeps herself alive is kind of exhilarating. It has a sense of feminism in it that young generations of female should fight for themselves and stand up against traditions, especially those non-sensical ones. This is a strong comparison to the other older females in the movie who just buy in to traditions.The ending is quite out of the expecatations though and made quite a laugh (at least to me).If you want to get thrilled, you won't be dissapointed. You will have a enjoyable 1.5 hour

This movie is awful. It's not funny. And that's why. As a horror comedy it has to at least deliver on one of these elements. Samara Weaving's acting is... well it's the scripts fault. There's really nothing going on here. This could've maybe been a 30 minute episode in an anthology series or something-although I don't even think they have enough material for that.This is not 'You're Next'. The main character is insufferable. She's not resourceful; she's useless. There are WAY WAY too many scenes that serve no purpose and just drag on the run time. It does not accomplish anything. It doesn't provide commentary nor is it satirical. It doesn't seem to strive to do anything.
It has some nice ideas and funny enough. people who like "shaun of the dead" or "hot fuzz" or "zombieland" would like this too.

I really enjoyed this
It's comedy horror - don't take it seriously and you'll have fun watching it
Samara weaving is great in this and I loved the last scenes

A fast horror, which does not give so much breath, but that gives a few laughs every now and then.I would have liked to see more construction of the characters, some deserved more space.The idea of the deadly game always works and even in this case it will not disappoint us.It's a film that focuses everything on the speed of action, catapulting us into a more fascinating hide and seek game than it seems.I really liked the ending, which I certainly didn't expect and also some directional choices that surprised me pleasantly.Unfortunately, I must also say that the film is not very deep and many aspects of the plot deserved much more attention.The film entertains very well, but once finished it won't be remembered for long.
Brilliant acting,great story line .Very entertaining!Loved it !

I enjoyed this movie. I love horror movies, and it's becoming increasingly difficult to find good, entertaining ones.
This kept my attention and was fun to watch. The storyline is familiar, but has been changed up enough to keep it interesting.
Worth a watch!

Review title: Interesting idea, but execution lacking in creativity or thrills
Review_body:
While the concept of The Most Dangerous Game involving a woman against her in-laws is somewhat original, the execution of this film is bad.Problems:
1. This is probably the most undeveloped main character I have ever seen. You learn almost nothing about her history or desires, which makes it really hard to care about her more than the fact she's being chased by murderers. Most of the characterization and time is spent with the family members, who are the villains, and almost all of them are pathetic.2. The profanity in this film is over the top. The characters probably swear twice as much as a Tarantino film, and with a lot less creativity or impact. It would be funnier to hear the "blue-blood" family start swearing once things start getting so bad for them, but all of them are swearing left and right from the beginning of the film so there's no escalation that makes the profanity interesting.3. The film teases out a class struggle at the very beginning, with the protagonist concerned about marrying into this upper crust family, but along with the swearing from #2 these family members really don't act very high class at all, the main character Grace has a posh accent that doesn't make her come off as lower class, so this plot/theme goes nowhere at all.4. It looks like the filmmakers were trying to make this more realistic at times (but not consistently so), so the main protagonist has no special combat skills, ingenuity, or athletic ability. As a result, too many of her "successes" are pure luck or someone doing something stupid. As a result, this film pits the Unremarkable vs. the Unintelligent. This isn't that exciting.5. There are really very few interesting set pieces, probably due to lack of imagination or funds. The action appears in short, boring bursts, and there's no visual wow factor. You get the feeling they didn't have much in the way of stunt coordinators.6. A related problem is that you never get a good perspective of the mansion or grounds, and with characters wandering in and out of the plot at random, you never get a really good perspective of how difficult it would be to "seek" Grace. The film just meanders from room to room, and the tension of the hunt just dissipates as a result. I'm guessing they just didn't have the funds to acquire a good interior location for the set.

I didn't know much about the film before viewing it.
I thought it was funny and suspenseful.
Loved Samara.
Funny!!

The Movie did not suck , it is a Well orchestrated to an extent. But the whole Movie i just yelled KILL HER ALREADY!. The whole Movie was this satanic whorshipping family trying to kill this girl the whole Movie from beginning to the end and they just fail miserably numerous times. A prolonged story. An ok Movie.

Review title: What is worse than worst movie ever ??? This movie
Review_body: This movie is just one of the worst movies I ever saw. Not a good idea , no good acting specially the main girl which is annoying actually. I hope this crew does not do any new movies ever.

This was a really fun movie that had me giggling throughout. Dark comedy at its finest. If you weren't smiling at the end then you don't get it (and if you don't get it then don't review it!) If you're okay with some gore then I totally recommend watching.
Oh, and the main character does an amazing job getting the crap kicked out of her!! She's awesome!

Good movie for the gore, but it was alright overall. Not something I'd rave about. The higher rating is because of the gore-factor. I liked the comedic elements. The backstory was very convoluted and over-teaching, but I wouldn't liked to see the box open and determine what all of the other cards were.
I wasn't sure what to expect, but I really liked this movie! Great cast, good story and the perfect mix of suspense and dark comedy!

Review title: This should have at least 7.9 IMDb rating
Review_body: This movie is extremely unique in the true sense. It's a dark comedy but it's also kinda sad. Honestly, no matter what genre you prefer, you'll end up liking this movie.

Probably the best horror film I've ever seen and the dark humor gives the perfect comedic relief at just the right times. While similar to Get Out I actually liked this better. Anyone giving it poor review can only be from a dislike of the genre, rather than the film itself. Great movie.

You know how once in a while a movie releases that completely exceeds your expectations and then blows you away. A movie that just makes your whole day turn around. READY OR NOT is definitely that movie.What could have been a very straightforward slasher film about our heroine surviving the night of brutality turns into this twisted dark humorous and somewhat supernatural ride. The movie is simply astounding, the kills are gory and then the suspense, oh how it builds and how it makes you care so much about Samara Weaving's character.The whole day I had been feeling pretty down but after watching this, all I can think about is how good this film was. I think it's definitely up there with 'You're Next' in the 'surprisingly amazing horror' category.Samara Weaving has made me believe that she can do no wrong. Her comedy timing, her murdery rage as well as all her scared scenes are so natural. We should just go ahead and enlist her in the Scream Queens hall of fame (along with Jessica Rothe of Happy Death Day fame). The whole cast brilliantly supports the story by giving a taste of weirdness and quirkiness.Damn, this movie is good. I highly recommend it. It's so Fun. So brilliant in it's execution.8/10. You know what change that to a 10/10. I loved it so so so much!
A very nice black comedy with genuine humour, with very good performances. It keeps viewers attention until the end. Also there are many unpredictable moves that keep the interest high.

Review title: I thought I was ready... i was wrong.
Review_body: Here we are, it's been a couple hours since I've finished this, spending the 5.99 USD to rent it, and I've had some time to gather my thoughts and restore some of the lost brain cells. Over all...what a waste. There are some seriously, comedic as well as righteous kill scenes. Weird twist on a cult narrative, I guess. Little Grace who, as it was pointed out to me. Looks like she might be 90lbs but somehow manages to overpower, literally everyone. Grown men, women twice her size. The only assault I wouldnt question what the little 10 year old savage she bludgeoned. The creators didn't have the stones to really follow through and of course theres the always iconic scenes where they could kill her.... very easily. But they dont and she somehow manages to escape once again. What rich white, family doesnt have hunting dogs... that would gave been a radical scene, to set them on her sent when she broke free... sometime I wonder if creators of movies like this, ever have that moment, like when you leave an argument and then think of all the savage things you could have said. But instead of sick burn its actually decent content. Really I think the scariest thing about the entire movie was Auntie Helen and that hair. But hey, what creepy old crow doesnt give you the heebie geebies.

Original action horror that is pretty humorous to boot.The leading lady (heroine) is priceless. Love her expressions. I hope to see her in more movies as she could be a super star (as long as she doesn't go the woke, political route).I don't know why but Australian females are so cool and amazingly beautiful , yet down to earth (not prissy). Love them and loved this flick.
Adam Brody's acting skills were amazing. Long time no see that kind of good quality horror movie which conveys dark humor in best way. Great ending as well.

Review title: Great horror comedy combo with good twist
Review_body: This is one of those somewhat predictable but not really type of movies. I have a habit of trying to figure movies out from the first minute but I wasn't able to with this one. Every time I thought I was close to the truth something else happened to make me change my theory. This along with some good laughs and classic bloody violence makes this one a winner in my book. Especially with that twist at the end. Not usual these days for a movie to surprise me enough that I actually have a real good "WTF just happened" moment.

This movie the way we loved it. Put it on at a bored time just to have on in the background. Ended up glued to the screen. The story is even surprisingly deeper than it first appears. Great humor and awesome gore.

This film is great in many ways. It is very gory for the horror fans however it has an aspect of comedy making the film easy to watch. It's refreshing to have a horror that makes you tense and laugh at the same time.
However this movie doesn't really have a big horror aspect to it more of a thriller. So if your looking for scares this isn't the one.

Review title: Well directed movie, no complaints whatsoever. Enjoyed every second
Review_body: Intriguing story, perfect pacing, entertaining characters, Samara Weaving.After having watched Weaving in the two Babysitter's movies and finding out she was in this one, I had to check this out. Actually, I've been meaning to watch Ready or Not since it came out but never did for whatever reason.This movie is perfect. It met every and any expectations I might have had and exceeded them all. I have nothing but good things to say about it. Those who rated this movie low might have a preference in horror movies, as this one is a comedic horror. Besides that, I don't see any reason why Ready or Not would receive a rating below 5 at least.I was happy to see some nice gore and even when it went a tad bit overboard at the end, I'm not one to nitpick. I really love Grace. She's realistic and I believe that's how I would act if I were in her shoes. She's badass and adapts quickly in the deadly survival game. Honestly at the end when dawn came, I wondered what would happen if all of what the family hold to be tradition was false. Like they didn't die if they failed to kill the bride. I thought that was going to happen when they opened their eyes in the light and nobody died. At least not yet, lol.A brilliant watch for me! I would recommend to those who like a fun horror with friends and family. You will definitely not be disappointed!
If the thought of being bored for an hour and a half this is definitely the horror movie for you. Otherwise, stay away.

So, I'd never even heard of this movie. It shows up as a Saturday night premier on a certain streaming app, and I decided to give in. Let me also say I tend to give more leeway to a movie that I didn't pay $25 plus snacks to see. If I can sit outside and catch it on my phone and it entertains me, that usually helps it's rating for me.At first, it sorta seemed to be a "Get Out" rip-off, but I was certainly not. It's sometimes scary, sometimes slow, sometimes campy. The end pays off, so stay with it.Don't take this movie to serious. Just enjoy it. It's really pretty fun!

Review title: Rating is 6.8?? How?? I feel betraid!
Review_body: It is not a great movie, but it entertain. A lot of things make no sence, a lot of cliches, you always can figure out what is going to happen next. But the premise is good. And it could have made a great story. But it rappidly lost the logic and you start questening a lot of things. Anyaway, its entertains you and makes you laught. It looks like a low budget movie and some of the actors are knowed but it seems like they made this movie just out of choice. And you "buy it" but then you realise "oh, so you career its pretty much over, right?". After all and besides many, many, MANY questions, one of the biggest is just "how in the hell can she survive and do all those things with that damaged hand?". You can say "survival instinct". But... really? Really? Could you really say that? And I'm not even going to talk about the end. The end it's just a big joke and a big "what the fu***?"

As far as dime a dozen horror movies go, this is decent. The premise is pretty decent; the acting decent, lots of gore. What this film lacks is transition. The character leaps are incredibly fast and lack subtly to show how they arrived in their state of mind. While the ending was expected; could have used a recap explaining the consequences everything would have had. Movie would have actually been better with a longer runtime and not catering to 90 min attention span sheep.
Worth the watch; just don't create expectations prior or you will be disappointed.

Review title: Wait... what? This is a reused plot?
Review_body: As it progressed, my sense of deja by turned into an ability to know what was coming next and, finally, the dawning surprise that... I've seen this before. Oh... I see... it's a remake of another film, and not even an old one. Blech!

Review title: Surprised at the Strong Negative opinions
Review_body: I enjoy horror films more than my girlfriend. When I saw the description of this one, with a combination of humor, romance and horror, I thought she might like, so we went. We both really enjoyed Ready Or Not. The profanity was nothing 'out of place'.... it's stuff real people would (and DO) say every day. The plot was clever and fun, film production excellent, well-acted, there were a few scares, a number of very funny scenes and spoken lines, and we were engrossed the entire way. Spoke with the couple sitting near us afterwards and they liked it too. There are a few graphic shots but nothing felt gratuitous. It seemed real and you felt for the plight of the entire family. Hey, we all have opinions but for some of the reviewers to be throwing around words like putrid, stay at home, waste of time..... that's ridiculous. If you don't like this genre, then don't go. It's not a classic, but we were certainly amused!
Loved it! Laughed and was grossed out successfully at the same time! Great plot. Watch it without excpectation!

Review title: Meh, it was fun. Had potential, but ultimately failed.
Review_body: Fun movie (certainly not a waste of time), but it could have been way better. Dialogue sucked. Too much overuse of profanity to try and sound modern/hip/cool. How about actually writing with some intelligence and vocabulary (I know, I know, it's really hard to look up words in an online thesaurus).This movie had a great mood/feeling throughout, but it lacked in some areas that would really make it better:1. The whole, everybody gets CGI zapped at the end was entirely too convenient (and not scary by the way - how about some disturbing practical effects? Which 99% of modern horror lacks - which is why they suck by the way).2. It would have been much more fun if the bride went on a vengeance rampage (à la You're Next). Instead, she basically, avoided everybody until dawn - meh.3. Also, the lore was a very interesting start, but they didn't dive in nearly enough, and it could have been so much cooler had they gone into the history & "why" of it more. Again the ending was too convenient and "wrap-up for time's sake." It would have been much better if they actually had the spirit show up (i.e. more than a stupid shadow in a chair) and actually wreak some havoc.4. I get that a lot of the movie was meant to be funny (and it honestly was in some parts), but unfortunately, it would have been better to just use it as comic relief, rather than stretching too thin on both parts (i.e. horror and comedy) and creating a basically watered down horror movie with no real tension.

Is it really so hard to write a story that has a bit of meaning?
Everybody left the theater.

Great fun movie. Poor reviews which you will read and realise idiots have written them. Best movie I have seen in a long time and I watch plenty of movies. Watch this if you have a sense of humour, if not, don't bother.
Cheezy, tacky and a waste of time. Don't waste your money. Misleading trailer.
You are shot and bleeding ,you are cut all over body and bleeding but still you live through whole night while 7 people who are stronger then you trying to kill you.could of make it more realistic.
The end may not come in handy with some people, but it is great! I mean it's not like the usual end you will expect. Other than that it's great...no discussion.

I like the moive, had some funny moments that i dont apreciate ,especially when it is supposed tobe a horror movie, but its ok , less the end when people just exploded...that make the moive more stupid

When I first saw the trailer for this movie I was a little disappointed because they almost show the entire film in the trailer to think but when I already watched it I was left at the edge of my seat the movie was very thrilling and funny!! There are some gory scenes as well that will make you squirm. The movie has the perfect blend of comedy and horror wherein you will find yourself laughing and terrified at the same time.

Sometimes you have to wonder what is going through the minds of the people who make films like this. I have to imagine it went along the lines of "We have a great concept!" Then, "Let's ruin it with banal dialog and poor execution!" They went running after that.A film like this requires sharp dialog to work. Constantly dropping F-bombs does not meet that requirement. It's not even inventive swearing. It's just F-this and F-that. There's nothing witty, deep, or interesting in the conversations.Meanwhile, a lot of the jokes simply don't work. They leave you wondering about the massive incompetence of all involved. While that could work, it killed any tension that the bride was in any serious danger.Of course another problem is the film's tone is all over the place.It is a bad film.

Same old formulae .Nothing original, unlikeable characters.Not funny nor entertaining.Why can't filmmakers create a movie that will genuinely tell a story that will keep the viewer engaged, whilst giving them a fright.Avoid at all costs.

Review title: Horror and Comedy that works very well
Review_body: Easy, fun, and entertaining to watch. Great details making the movie more interesting (soundtrack, Grace's laugh, 'puzzled' home).Great acting by the casts, Samara Weaving was a top-notch.
Absolutely insane movie that uses it's unique premise to great effect. The acting was great with the lead actress being a real standout.

Ready or Not tells a story about playing "Hide and Seek" with the family in a brutal way! It all starts with Grace's wedding with Alex Le Domas. After the wedding, traditionally a randomly chosen game must be played. Grace gets "Hide and Seek", the hunt begins and she fights for her survival. So first of all, the plot is well staged with the game as the main theme of the movie. The main protagonist does act really smart with interesting decisions and has a good character development. The other family members, except of one, on the other hand don't even have any or just a litlle development. Especialy there is one character process where I thought: "WHY? Did I just miss something?" As the trailer promises there are brutal and bloody scenes that the movie shows. So you will definitely see pain and death scenes, but this also includes deaths of unnecessary characters. The movie also switches from serious moments to funny moments really quick, so you can clearly see it's a Horror movie with comedy elements. But all in all I can say these comedy scenes are fine and you can laugh a bit, so I liked them! The cast is in my opinion also good in particular my two favourites are Samara Weaving as Grace and Adam Brody as Daniel Le Domas. One think I hate on that movie is the camera, it shakes too much. Even if this camera setting is by purpose for the atmosphere, it clearly doesn't work.
In the end I TOTTALY RECOMMEND this movie everyone who likes to be entertained. If you don't care about the few weak points like the characters or the camera and you can enjoy a simple story with a smart protagonist and bloody scenes, than it is the right movie for you.
BUT I DO NOT RECOMMEND this movie if you want to see really good unique plots with well written characters. Also if you dont like unnecessary brutal scenes, than you should not watch this movie.Have a nice day!

A bride's wedding night takes an unexpected turn as her new eccentric in-laws force her into a terrifying game.
Directed by Matt Bettinelli-Olpin and Tyler Gillett who have only directed shorts so far and they do a good job but not surprising. The soundtrack helps a lot to build the tension of the movie.
Samara Weaving, who plays the main character Grace, is doing very well in the movie. She perfectly delivers what the character has done and has greatly improved since last film i saw her in the Netflix's "The Babysitter".
Despite having a good idea, the movie lacks a lot of crucial factors. The humor presented in the movie is very weak and out of tune, driving the viewer away from the movie several times and the secondary characters are all one-dimensional and those the movie tries to plant some subplot does not end.
Despite the stumbling blocks, you can have a good hour and a half with Ready or Not. Note 7/10

Review title: A good movie to watch once.
Review_body: The movie itself is a very clever plot bug was rushed. The ending is nothing I expected it to be like, but that's all I can without spoiling anything.You can't go wrong watching this movie once. It is not a movie you will most likely want to watch over and over, but it is a solid one or two watch throughs worth of good content.

This movie is wonderful. It crosses the line to comedy a lot, doesn't take itself too seriously and keeps an interesting pace.
I wish I could watch this for the first time all over again

Review title: High rates must have shares in the film!
Review_body:
Why do they always have to put the 'comedy' into it?
What is suppose to be a horror and have you quaking won't work if they keep putting unfunny cracks in the film.....takes away the building atmosphere.
Don't think just watch, certainly doesn't have you thinking that's for sure.
So if you are looking for 'comedy' non stimulating of the brain and cartoon gore go and see it.

I really enjoyed this film. Samara weaving 1st time i have seen her in a movie was brilliant. She actually made this movie work, she was the perfect cast for this part.
The movie was more of a fun horror to watch rather than a scary horror. The story was good, the filming was great and all the actors played great roles.I love these kind of horror movies because they dont go too far in details and gore and pop up shockers with screaming sounds. They are more fun to watch and dont leave you affected such as "The Excorcist" I mean that film leaves you looking under your bed at night.

Review title: Great fun to watch, unexpected plot, hidden gem
Review_body: Weird, funny, very entertaining and fantastically unexpected.Watched it on a long haul flight and found it refreshingly different. Great acting, hilarious scenes and highly recommend it.
It's really fun to watch,, and the only thing that it promises to give you is delivered: a good time watching a movie.

Review title: getting damage is not her weakness
Review_body: If there was a directors mute version , i would like it 2 stars more .But at a point , screaming , shouting, struggling , got very annoying .

Review title: Waited 10 minutes to give this review a catchy title..man...this is what i think...
Review_body: Been an IMDb user for more than 12 years, i've been choosing movies to watch after reading hundreads of reviews from different users, checking "parents guides", critics choices that seem similar to mine, know every good (and bad) horror/thriller since 2005, appreciate the good ones (edge of the seat) (The Conjouring, The Autopsy of Jane Doe, The Descent, The Hills Have Eyes, Wrong Turn, I Spit On Your Grave, Hereditary and many many many more) but this movie made me write my first ever review. I've read comments like "this made me write my first review" before, but i just had to do it, man, this movie was a HELL OF A RIDE - edge of the seat moments, thrilling atmosphere and a good storyline! Im not going to say anything else, just go watch this movie if you want to a Good Movie Night!

Review title: I didn't necessarily dislike this movie... I nothinged it
Review_body: Was this comedy? Was this horror? It failed at both. I guess it was sufficiently entertaining at points, but mostly it just never really came together for me. And if you're being chased by crazed murderers, and you knock them out, pick up the gun!!!!

I do love these kind of action movies. A twisted rich family plays a game after every marriage in their family to accept the new bride/groom. The game depends on the card new person pulls out. All games are fun except for that one card.
When the new bride pulls out that one card unknowingly, the deadly Game of Hide & Seek begins.This movie has all, action, survival, comedy & amazing acting. Loved it!!

Light movie. Not too intense horror if you're not a horror fan, although there is quite a bit of violence. Very humorous and especially in the third act. Samara Weaving was also very good. Overall, highly recommended.

Loved this movie, it will definitely be on my favorites list for a while! Great blend of horror comedy. It was fun but still sold the story line quite well. Loved Samara Weavings acting in it, definitely nailed the role. Even with the humor of the movie she definitely sold the scared and angry aspects. I found the pace and plot were all well done and i honestly don't really have anything bad to say about it. It was quite enjoyable and im looking forward to a rewatch.

Yet another movie where the main character is about as smart as a rock and has ZERO survival instinct. I'm so over these type of movies. Oh look a gun at my feet, let me just leave that there for ones trying to kill me, twice mind you. Maybe I'll just scream for no reason so everyone can hear me. So ridiculously stupid...
If u can look beyond the senseless plot of this crazy, fun, blood bath of a movie, u will definitely enjoy it.

Do yourself a favor and stop reading reviews and watch it if you can enjoy absurd movies.Continue only if you've seen it.I think they tried to do a bad movie and failed and ended up with a masterpiece that not even they expected great post production, directing and script!I wanted to vote 10 to improve the grades but well, let's be fair and give it an 8.

A unique and fun movie! My only issue was the ending. The writers could've done SO much more, and literally chose to do the least thrilling ending of them all. Be prepared for an awesome movie with sort of a let down the last 3 minutes.

Review title: If you like horror / slasher, then definitely a great movie
Review_body:
Positive:
At first, there's definitely similarities between this movie and "You're Next" when it comes to general plot. An entire family ends up getting hunted down and killed by a lead female role. However, this movie was pretty spot on with originality and an interesting plot. Acting wasn't half bad for a horror movie. Could definitely connect with the characters in certain emotions they went through. The plot fairly original with really good suspense throughout the whole movie. Visual effects were well done. Definitely qualifies as a horror / slasher / suspenseful movie with some comedy thrown in here and there. And I love the fact that this is a standard normal family in the sense that none of them have any fighting experience. So there's no "badass" character that just runs around being John Wick and magically kills everyone. Nah. The lead role (Grace) holds her own and definitely plays a badass in the things she has to do. But not in an "unrealistic" type of way. She fights like hell and holds her own. Overall, great movie.Negative:
The only places where I would dock points are the ending is the same as any horror film. A lot of "hunting" and killing throughout the movie to end with = everybody dies. Same ending as every horror movie. Which, I do get is part of the genre and what is expected. However, I think I more twist ending would be:
Have Alex turn on Grace, hold her to the table all the way up to the point where Alex picks up the knife, about to sacrifice her, says "Hail Satan" ... and then stab and kill Grace. Boom. Everyone expects the typical "everybody dies ending". Instead, mix it up. Give me "The Strangers" movie type ending: the bad guys win in the end. Sure, it wouldn't be the happy ending most people look for but its a HORROR movie. Its not suppose to end happily ever after.Despite this, I still give it 9/10 and definitely recommend it as a descent horror/scary/suspenseful move.

Review title: Very good horror movie but not an instant classic.
Review_body: This isn't a comedy. It's a straight up horror movie. And compared to most of the movies I've watched recently (I'm a huge fan of the genre) this one is in the top 10%. Well worth your time.And although they do show killing, it's not especially gross or excessive, in terms of violence, for 2020. I would watch it again. And I usually don't do that

I've seen many ridiculous movies, but this one is one of the top.5.
No, it's not funny.
No, it's not witty.
It's just a waste of time, skip it.

I enjoyed this light hearted horror. It doesn't take itself seriously but commits to the characters and the genuine horror experienced by the unfortunate bride. Definitely a movie that is fun to watch with friends and when you aren't looking to watch anything too heavy.

Review title: The type of movie you will watch on Halloween
Review_body: It's not bad , but not to god . This movie will be more likely good on Hallowwen , when you are with ur friends , and bored . Anyway I enjoy the movie It was entertaining and funny

Review title: Good movie, not the best but enjoyable
Review_body: I give this an 7 out of pure enjoyment. This movie is Ridiculously dumb but funny and is just enjoyable, the story is simple but easy to follow with some ridiculous parts. Some stupidity there and there but nothing that just makes you Want to quit the movie
So much better than what I initially thought. Has an interesting plot and the suspense keeps you moving.

Review title: a movie for people who are getting married...!!!
Review_body: This one is all you need if you are getting married...take your bride-to-be and watch that movie...if she is still saying yes...well..she's the one ...:P

Review title: a movie with tense atmospher and dark humour
Review_body: I like it. It's all about sacrificing a victim to the devil so the devil worshiper will always be rich.... or die if they failed to give sacrifice. Samara (do you notice that she just looks like margot robbie? Maybe they can be casted together as sisters) shows the genuine struggle and pain between life and death. And in the end....pop pop pop

If you notice you can see that the new horror movies these days are about mothers or fathers or like this one in-laws, the new kind of horror movies are making us be afraid of a person (almost always a person really close like mother) and not an unnatural or supernatural creature, and i personally find that beautiful, cause the thing we should really be afraid of in our lives is not a clown under our bed.
And the important point is the new horror is showing us what happens to our believes when a mother or a father, which in the past were assumed to be the shelter when we're afraid, become the monster themselves.
Like the picture i saw, it was written on the wall "who should we call when the police murders?"
Don't listen to the bad reviews, this movie was great. Really captivating with an interesting ending. Overall the acting was great and it was a very enjoyable movie.
I watch this movie with my friends. It was funny. I definitely recommend it

Dear People Who Saw the Trailer and Thought "This Looks Fun!"
I have something to say: IT IS FUN!Acting, setting, story... Everything about this movie is F-U-N. But of course, it's not a horror movie so if you're expecting to be scared, believe me... Even your grandma's mustache is scarier than this.Know what you're watching people! Know what you're watching, please?

Review title: Directed by a 1st year cinamatography student?
Review_body: Either the director was inexperienced or not paying attention. Scenes were setup clearly for the benefit of the camera despite interfering with the story line. The screen play seemed as though the actors were given no script and then told to ad-lib. Situations in the plot had not connection to the story, and at times it seemed that the whole production was intended to be a parody of a low-grade thriller, however it couldn't even pull off that successfully. If this was performed by a small-town amateur troop consisting of neighbors and their kids it might have been entertaining, but this was certainly was not a commercial quality production.

Review title: Great concept terrible writing and execution
Review_body: Great concept terrible writing and execution. Too many plot wholes and stupid character choiced

The title says it all. The premise sounds so dumb, like a B-horror, but everything else about the movie is perfectly done. The humor is great, the protagonist isn't some dumb Final Girl, but an actual bad ass, and the kills are gorey and funny.
You watch this movie envisioning how it's gonna end up, and believe me, you wanna stick around for the end of this one, it's a blast! Love this movie.
An Unique Plot which is delivered in a Superb way. Everything was good & the tensions on screen has actually transferred to me nail biting & highly Intriguing!Ending is a Totally Cool BLOOD BATH!

Review title: This movie stands on its own legs!
Review_body:
It felt new, even though the whole "accepting into the family horror" has been seen before. But it was different, almost like a breath of fresh air.
I recommend this movie, and who am I? Born in 1990, spend all my time watching movies and especially horror movies, I have seen some of the worst and some of the best, spend lots of hours in the dark of the cinema and great movies should be seen in cinemas.Its a comedy horror, mystery thriller, it was great, I laughed, I got a few spooks, the story was original, and the ending was something else.
The twist and turns made my ass hurts from sitting on the edge of the seat.
Its been a long time since i saw a good black comedy, so I got enthusiastic with Ready or Not (uninspired title though). You are gonna have a really good time watching this.

Review title: The Purge Meets Cabin in the Woods
Review_body: Comedic Horror certainly has it's place. With the same kind of survival humor that came with Cabin in the Woods, comes this movie about a bride who marries into money that hinges on a pact with the devil. A very good mix of gore, suspense, and humor. This movie delivers. In terms of horror, sure it's not there. But it's advertised as comedic horror, and it lives up to it. Very good. The Purge meets Cabin the Woods. Love it.

This film is an absolute gem. Never heard of it but the trailer caught my eye and certainly didn't disappoint. The family are ghastly, you are rooting for the to die horribly even before you are shown how terribly they are and obligingly they mostly do. Especially Grandma, she's an especially evil old bag. Excellent little twist at the end with just the right level of suspense, black comedy and blood n guts.

I was impressed. Samara Weaving is the new scream queen, she played her role with style and flair...and of course many screams.
There aren't enough good comedy horrors and this one ranks up there with Cabin in the woods.
I don't like long reviews so I'll end this one with, Watch this film, it's a good one.

Review title: Very good kept me on the edge of my seat through out the movie.
Review_body: At first when i watched this i thought it would be like every horror been released this year.but this was different i really enjoyed this.what made it so good is how unpredictable this movie was the acting was brilliant.this movie i give a solid 8.5 for a stellar perfomance.they need to make more horrors like this next year.

Review title: Oh this should have been better.
Review_body: I was truly disappointed while watching the movie. I liked the premise and wanted to like it, but from the beginning I was put off by the cartoony cast and the lack of atmosphere. There was no mystery, no suspense, no horror, no comedy. The cast was one-dimensional, simple and predictable. The cast just didn't gel into an ensemble. And although killing was new to some of the new family members, the older ones didn't have that feeling of commitment.The story is about this rich family who made their money by making a deal with the devil. A century ago, the devil provided them with the cash and resources to build a gaming empire. The devil only asked for annual animal sacrifices and that anyone new entering the family choose, from a strange box, a game to play. Of the choices of chess, checkers and old maid and others, the worse game to play is hide and seek. Played once before, it either means the death of the person. Or, if the person makes it to morning, the death of the family.A newly married woman, (Samara Weaving) who in order to enter the family, has to play a game. And wouldn't you know it, she chooses hide and seek to play. The hunt starts immediately with the bride unaware of the danger of death. For some reason, the family has to use antique weapons in their hunt. After a couple people try to kill her with cross bows and antique guns, she figures that the family wants her dead and runs. The rest of the movie is her running and hiding and being pursued and bleeding and trying to make it until the morning.You might think, "wow, what a great premise". And it is, but the execution is terrible and the chase quite predictable.

Review title: If you watch with zero expectations.....
Review_body: If you watch with zero expectations you will be impressed. Great acting, funny at times, extremely well written. For a C rating movie with C level actors......job well done!

Loved the movie. It was something a little different and was a refreshing watch. There was a lot of everything including humor, thrill, romance, family drama, etc. I enjoyed my time very much at the cinema. Never was I bored. The ending was very satisfying which is something not a lot of movies have in my opinion.

This was entertaining but a bad attempt to beat Get Out. Also, I have to point out the fact that as a white woman (and this is written by a white woman), she doesn't get shot by the cops at the end. That wouldn't have been the case if the Get Out protagonist had starred in this film, at least if they had depicted it realistically.

It was a really good movie. A bride realizing her in laws are crazy is relatable for tons of people.The humor in this really made me laugh. With the coke addicted daughter and her stupid husband who don't really understand how it all works, then the alcoholic eldest son who is done with everyone's crap. I actually laughed out loud. But it was very gruesome. Don't forget that part. Lots of blood.I was kind of disappointed in the end with Alex, but I'm at least happy that one of them in the end was like "screw my family"
You should watch this movie! Worth the $9

The story of the film is beautiful but the end is very bad
The end
The end
Bad end of the film
It is a comedy horror movie so don't expect to get terrified but all and all get ready for fun its awsome

The main character Grace is so annoying. She had so many chances to get a satisfying revenge kill on many of the lunatics and she never took the opportunity.
