She would just knock them out then run away, like HELLO?!?! They are still alive and after you dummy and they always showed up again lol wtf. The movie was predictable, I like horror movies with comedy but the jokes weren't funny at all. The supernatural ending was weak and did nothing for me.

Strange movie , it's between slasher , comedy and drama , the trailer got me interested , had a lot of fun watching it , it's one of those movie you can not take it seriously , you just have to enjoy and have fun with the killings .

Review title: I am seeing a lot of negative reviews! Are people mad?
Review_body:
One of the BEST movies ever! I am so surprised people are giving this low rating! Honestly, its making me not ever read any reviews about any movie, because of how innacurate they can be.
This movie, the director, script, acting, props, etc WAS ON POINT! I am absolutely baffled that someone is giving this movie a low rating.
I want them to make part 2 ASAP!
If you're thinking of going to see this, do it! You wont be disappointed. Its one of a rare movies, thats original & one of a kind. After i watched it, i jumped online to see whether they will make part 2.Go watch it

There isn't anything surprising or a major unexpected twist. Just some good gore and great laughs. At one point I asked if they were being serious with the plot through my laughter. I genuinely enjoyed it and am not dissapointed.

Review title: A delicious horror movie about the dangers of marrying into a family.
Review_body: I liked this movie from the beginning. The lead actress reminds me a lot of Margot Robbie. Shes just as talented too. The grandmother was a delight to watch even though she was a total witch. Hide and seek with a twist. There is a reason why and I won't spoil it for you but, sit back and enjoy. It's not trying to win any Oscars, just pure fun.

Review title: OK, it wasn't a waste of time.
Review_body: Good set up, but eventually predictable. The snark level was to low to make it funny. The drama was poorly written, so it wasn't intense. And, the horror was typical jump scares and a pretty dumb premise. Most of the CGI done well, but basic things like how much matter is in a human body made the physics stupid. I might watch it again when it streams assuming I have forgotten it by then.
This is a great thriller with some humor thrown in to break up the awkward moments. When I can sit down and not pay attention to all the ruckus in my house. It is a GOOD movie.

I don't think of this movie as an horror movie in any way. Yes, it is bloody but I actually laught a lot while watching it. The plot is silly but it keeps you entertained and I believe the character's arcs are actually really well made. Plus, the music is awsome throught the whole film.

It was a pretty good movie, slightly humorous, good acting especially from Samara Weaving. I liked that the blood-n-guts wasn't too over the top, but if you have a queasy stomach like I do, be warned that there's a gross vomiting scene near the end.
I was iffy about this movie since that truth or dare movie came out i was like another horror game concept but surprisingly good everyone should give this movie a shot

I enjoyed the movie a lot, there's not a single boring moment when I'm watching this, it just left me a weird feeling at the end. Watch for entertainment only, don't expect too much. I like the actress her acting is good, oddly that her character has more chemistry with her brother-in-law than her groom though. The family is sicked but also funny at the same time. Messy family got what they bargain for, lesson is, you never get anything for free in return, always got to pay, as you got more greedy, you have to pay a greater price.

I liked the film, it kept me entertained and made me look forward towards what was going to happen at the end. But I think the ending was a little bit too rushed , and this whole explosion thing didn't made it credible, I mean it would've been greater if they would've all died differently, I mean, in not such a ridiculous way.

Review title: What a Horror movie should be
Review_body: When you can balance funny moments with real suspense you've done something right and that is exactly what Ready it Not does. Very well paced film with a fun enough plot that you can't help but enjoy.It stays grounded in reality with a character that you can relate to and genuinely want to see survive as she continually makes smart choices. The humor is not lost and in many ways this feels like a dark comedy in several parts but walks such a fine line that everything seamlessly works.
The worst black comedy I've ever watched. Nothing to impress me besides the fact that Samara Weaving is hot and plays well her character.
Poor movie with the exception of the play of Samara Weaving, who is hot and played well
This movie was very different, interesting, entertaining, and fun!! It's definitely worth a watch.
Movie is awesome. I loved the story and acting. One of my favorite movie of 2019. Direction is good too.
Oh man, I loved this movie! So fun and held my attention the entire time! You will not be dissapointed!

Yes, this is a gore fest, and yes, there is bad language, but it's R rated and a horror. If you're looking for an intellectual whodunnit, you need to look elsewhere. I usually prefer my horror psychological, and I'm not a big fan of watching horror at the flicks, but as this was billed as comedy/horror, I gave it a go. I found it very entertaining and the black humour appealed to me, and the rest of the audience, judging by the chuckles. Good balance of horror and comedy.

I love the story, the plot. It's so unique. I've never watched other thriller movies using the like story.
The problem, the climax, for me it's 90% perfect. This is one of the best tense movies i've ever seen, after 'A Quite Place' and 'Halloween'
From beginning till the end, it entertain me with its tense way.
It's a faultless film. Great plot. Great comedic moments. Fab ending. It's a truly sorted movie. Samara Weaving is superb.

I really enjoyed it. Second degree of course. Funny horror movie. There are only a few per year that are nicely done. This one is one of them. Main character is great. To be watched with some good chips.

This film knows exactly what it is, and what I mean by that is, it's not trying to be anything it's not, will it win any major awards? No. Is it trying to? Also no. But, does the film achieve what it sets out to? Yes.This movie directed by Matt Bettinelli-Olpin and Tyler Gillet follows the events following a wedding and during the indoctrination of the bride into a rather strange eccentric family, these events culminate in a murderous game of hide and seek. The story and plot are all set out in front of the viewer within the first 20 minutes, not making the audience assume or work anything out. This choice does make the film rather simple, but it is also contributing to the ease in which you can enjoy this film.There isn't much in the way of character development outside of the two or three main characters, it uses classic horror/comedy movie tropes to get by, but in a film as short as this, that has as many characters as this its easily sacrificed for the sake of the film's momentum. For the most part, the movie is shot pretty well there's nothing outstanding about the camera work, with some nice creative shots here and there, but there's also nothing bad about the film's direction. This movie is also far funnier than id thought it would be, finding humor in some very dark ways, but all its all in keeping with the films tone and certainly makes good use of the films R rating for some over the top blood and violence to get its laughs.All in all at 1hr and 30 minutes this film is a breeze and barely lets the viewer catch their breath as it throws you right into the story and its all the better for it, because the story and plot aren't amazing and its also rather predictable, but that's the style and tone the directors set out to create when making this film. It uses its R rating well to create some very over-top gory deaths which are all in keeping with the film. My advice for going to watch this film is don't try and place your expectations too high, and just let the film take you through the story, it's a perfectly fine film, that knows exactly what it's trying to be, and over the top action thriller with some dark comic relief.

Today I saw two movies one is "It" and second this one,and i found this was more entertaining for me it was 10/10.
And yes during whole movie I thought she is Margot Robbie :D.
It's a well rounded movie, the gore, the comedy, the horror depiction. Bravo to the right. From white dress to red dress.
Amazing movie, not what I expected but it just got better and better. If you have the time watch it

Review title: Great idea, but really poor execution.
Review_body:
Well it starts good and the it turns into a low level comedy.
To be honest.... this had too much potential and I did not expect to fail that much.

Review title: I'm sorry I didn't love it tbh
Review_body: This is a comedy basically, neither horror, nor creep, Plot itself is contradictory if you find them, I've seen every horror movie probably better than this, the plot could be made more compact and converging. But idk why but I really didn't like it, the begining couldn't maintain its influence.Some scenes had funny and meaningless consequences in my mind. I'm sorry, but feels it's really cheap for a movie. I'm sorry, but it's my absolute personal opinion n feeling. Always appreciate the hardships of the entire cast and crew and all the people associated with the movie. Hope, they can make it better next time.

Review title: Does exactly what it says on the tin
Review_body: Anyone that has rated this low is not rating it in context. It's funny, creative and ticks all the right boxes

Review title: Not worth the 1s, definitely not worth the 10s
Review_body: I see a lot of 1s on here, but honestly this movie isn't that bad. What it is, is just a very mediocre dark comedy horror flick. One very important thing is that you do not take this movie seriously at any point. The concept is pretty original and fun, but it never really takes advantage of it. It just turns into a standard "you're next" type movie with a dark comedy overtone.The comic relief really is hit or miss. There were a couple of funny bits but also quite a few cringeworthy attempts. Samara Weaving does great as the main character and is a joy to behold when she turns into the sneaker-wearing murderous bride. The rest of the cast does a well enough job, never really standing out.It mostly is a case of missed opportunities though. The ending is very disappointing and really missed a chance for some proper revenge action. The entire concept of the hide and seek game could've been a lot more, but is in the end no more than an excuse for the characters to kill each other. The movie could've been a lot more fun, unique and original than it is now.The whole movie is certainly enjoyable as long as you do not take it seriously. Don't think about the plotholes. Ignore the sometimes downright moronic character decisions. Just grab some popcorn, turn your mind off and you will probably have a decent time. Wait for a streaming release and give it a shot if you're bored.
This movie is not worth the money you spend on a movie ticket trust me. After a while I wanted to walk out it was so boring.

Review title: Unexpectedly funny, with twists you wouldn't see coming
Review_body: I went into this movie expecting a boring, gory slasher with an uninspired plot. I can say I was surprised when I found myself cracking up and glued to the screen. The acting was great, the jokes were aplenty, and the overall theme interesting. Each character in the family was unique, from the evil eyed great-aunt to the coked up sister in law. My only real gripe with the movie was the story of the origins of the game seemed to be glossed over.It is explained, but not in the way that was satisfactory to me. In fact, if not for the fatal twist at the end it would have been a high five rating to a six. The ending is absolutely fantastic, however, and leaves you satisfied. Survival is the game and this movie survives. Pure hilarity, decent storytelling make this movie one of the surprises of the summer for me!
Couldnt even completed watching the movie, due to the very poor performance of almost all "actors", especially the (bride) girl.

Review title: I would say best one this year
Review_body: I don't understand bad reviews. I haven't watched a better comedy horror in years. This film is definitely one of my favorites in 2019. I recomend, entertain yourself with this film and don't think too much.

The perfect blend of tense/scary/a bit of gore with spot on humor. What I loved the most was I couldn't guess the ending. And I loved it. Just perfect. I haven't enjoyed a horror film this much since Get Out. You won't be sorry if you watch.

Review title: The movie should have been called "Till Death Do Us Part."
Review_body: Great movie but It would have been more intriguing had it been purely horrifying and not at all comical.

Review title: A fun movie worth your time
Review_body: Gave it a chance after avoiding it for a while thinking it was a trashy B-movie....was pleasantly surprised by the brilliant acting, uncomplicated story-line and 'killer ending'.....much like 'Get Out'...just funnierAlso, is it just me or does Samara Weaving look like a cross between Emma Stone and Margot Robbie?
I read the reviews, was dubious, took a shot anyway. I really really enjoyed this film! Comedy and horror together - all so good and very original!

Review title: The biggest surprise of the year
Review_body: Watching this film, I expected another mediocre to terrible slasher/horror film. The trailers didn't do this film service and the marketing team did a terrible job because this film is brilliant and one of the best horror film of the decade. It is fast-paced, hilarious like a dark comedy, and so much fun to watch with a breakout performance by Samara Weaving, Ready or Not will leave you speechless by the end, especially because of the brilliant ending at the end.

I hadn't watched any Samara Weaving movies before this one and I'm glad. She set the perfect tone to the entire movie. Her growth is seen throughout the acts. I would actually let some of the plot holes slide with a performance like that.

This movie is a mix of Good and Bad Scenes. Sometimes, the emotions work and when it is followed by some Dark Humor, it won't work the way it should. In one scene, You feel empathy for the lead character and in the next scene you would laugh at the situation when she cusses. It's like a Harley Quinn's Drama.
It has a little dose of everything but the BGM makes you glued along with some fun Scenes, which is why I rated it above the average score.Her Scream can make the Horses Run!

I loved this flick. It was stylish, fun to watch, plenty gory and kept me interested the whole way through. The last 30 minutes especially were fantastic and dare I say gripping!Samara Weaving stood out for her performance as Grace, she nailed it playing a character who had clearly been forced into a dangerous and violent situation and seeing her develop over the course of the events was nothing short of awesome.For a fun time and a short and sweet thriller I highly recommend this film and I can see me watching it again.

Review title: Love love love: never get married
Review_body: Fun horror film playing with the natural fear of what sort of family you're getting into. Fun mix of comic repeat and genuine suspense kept me locked in. That and the main actress is a star: I would watch a movie of her doing laundry.Go see!

Review title: One of its own kinda movie
Review_body: Loved it, all who are sick of stupid super hero movies must watch this gem
This movie is almost exactly like Getout. It is pretty good though
The movie was boring in a lot of it, But it's worth watching.

Ready or Not has a simple premise of tradition above all else. When Grace decides to marry into one of the wealthiest families in the world, she gets a little more than she bargained for. The family made its money in games and for one night only she gets to draw a card at random revealing, of course, the only bad game in the deck, Hide and Seek.It does take a while to get the full picture of what's all going on, despite a brief prologue that basically tells you what's what at the beginning. But as you go along you become as skeptic as some of the featured players in the film. The twists and turns along the way sure make for an entertaining ride.I'll be honest that most of the concept is nothing new, but the history, setting, and climax make the journey worth the trip. I give the main actress Samara Weaving top props for very difficult 'pain acting' as I call it, and deem her a true scream queen.

Review title: I feel very even keel about this one
Review_body: Didn't love it, don't hate it. Kinda funny, kinda dumb. Even keel.

Review title: I had a great time with this film.
Review_body: Ready or Not was a blast in the cinema. This is a prime example of how much fun a film can be when it knows exactly what it is. Ready or Not does contain some social commentary, but it doesn't get bogged down in it. This is a tight script. Now don't go into this film expecting straight up horror. I found this film surprisingly funny, and those who don't like their horror and comedy to mix, may want to give this film a miss. I found the cast of characters all very likeable, and even though it's set in one location, the variety on show here is great.The film centres on Grace, marrying into the extremely rich and eccentric "La Domas" family. She's an outsider and looked down upon as a "Golddigger", so she is eager to prove herself to her new family. So when a weird family tradition rears it's head at midnight on her wedding night, she goes along with it not knowing what awaits her. I found Grace to be a fantastic lead. Her performance conveying at first naivety and innocence, and then when required shock, anger and resilience. I believed her struggle and found it highly cathartic when she got her own back at certain points in the film. Also Grace should go down as an iconic female in horror, her get up consisting of a tattered wedding dress, shotgun with holster and converse. I hope to see people dressed as her come Halloween.This film was just so refreshing to see. It's completely original, not based on anything and not part of a pre-existing universe. Like Crawl, it had a story to tell and just asks that you go along with it for an hour and half. For some its plot may come across as silly, but the films knows this and offers up some brilliantly dark comedy. It's 94 minutes, and those minutes fly by whether your Ready or Not.
Mindless, boring gorefest with no particular entertainment value.

I never really enjoy horror movies because of the weak story but this movie was really enjoyable!
Samara Weaving was amazing trough out the whole movie. If you don't love horror, I would still recommend watching it as it's just a chill kind of horror mixed with comedy. Fun to just put on with some friends
Cinematography is good and that's something.So long and thanks for all the fish.

I've been passing over this for ages thinking it looked a load of rubbish but finally watched it tonight. I'm glad I did, it's well worth a watch and was full of laughs which if I'm honest I didn't initially realise. It's a good laugh full of some very funny and also OUCH moments.
I like it. Jumpscares and horror but the end was very weird for me.

Ready or Not is a dark comedy. Not meant for the sensitive ones looking for a slap stick comedy.If you can ignore the killing and blood and can focus on a very strange family with traditions that are bizarre, and a new bride being chased through the house trying to dodge arrows and shotguns, you'll have a blast.Characters are great, as strange as they may be. The costumes and dark settings only lend to the atmosphere.The finale is all you could ask.It's a winner for me!
This is first of all beautiful in its colors and cool concept. And hilarious.. and this coming from someone that can't watch horror films!

I love thrillers they are my favorite type of flick first of all, but this one here I really enjoyed because I truly believe the super rich are all evil and this kind of reminds me of real life rich folks lol ...
Good movie to watch if you wanna scar your kids. Acting is great, comedy is good, the jumpscares are good. Might wanna experience this with headphones.
Its an funny movie with some horrorlike jumpscares and a beautiful story.
I've become obsessed with ritual movies and this did not disappoint.
Soooo overrated. Full of cliches with some humour here and there. 7 rating really beats me!

Review title: Should be horrible, but it's funny.
Review_body: Good work of actors. But its not a thriller - it's a black comdey. With jokes, story and good decorations. My rank are between 7 and 8.

It wasn't one bit scary, neither was it funny, I never laughed once. Watch this if there is nothing else to watch on TV.
I can't understand the 10 star ratings.
The lead actress was the best thing in it.

Totally unexpected and extraordinary finale. I was just amazed. The rest of the movie, one might say "something standard" but that finale, oh that finale. You've got to watch this, if even it's only for its ending scenes.

Review title: Ready to kill on your wedding day!!
Review_body: It was a really good movie I enjoyed it! I recommend seeing it!

Review title: Walked out it was so dumb.
Review_body: Thought this had promise but every part of the movie seemed just dumb. They had no choice to be in the situation? What? At every turn the characters could have made an acceptable choice to get them out of the situations but instead they almost always had to explain why the logical choice couldn't be possible. Each argument was never convincing. After the third random kill of the servants I left. Wasn't funny nor scary. Sucked. Not a break out role for the Margot Robbie wannabe either.

Review title: A good time, but nothing special.
Review_body: Ready or not was a solid effort. I cannot fault any part of the production. Effects, cinematography, acting, score and plot were all solid. But that's kinda the problem... It was just solid.The movie was entertaining, with lots of good comedic moments as well as times of great suspence.For me the big problem is that it's almost as if the movie shows its hand very early. Entire plot is given away in the trailer and so the entire set up of the film seems like lobour till you get to the good stuff.The "good stuff" is about and hour and a bit, of running and hiding... And pretty much just that.Nothing wrong with the film, but for me personally, not worth a re-watch and would possibly recommend to people who are in for a lazy Sunday view...

It is a great thriller with a good dose of comedy. It doesn't set out to be taken seriously, it is just a great hour and a half of fun. Just a great watch. Give it a chance; I would love to watch more titles like this one.It doesn't waste time with useless background, we all know what we need right from the start and that's it. After that, it's just a fun ride.Samara Weaving is the absolute best, she mixes fear, irony, humor and toughness like no one else. Loved her in The Babysitter and in this one.Just go for it.

Review title: Hate to say that, but the ending ruined it
Review_body: It was a really fun movie with almost the right balance of comedy and horror, with better cinematography, directing and acting than I expected from a film of that genre. However the ending ruined the whole movie for me.The message that I got until the last 5 minutes is that supertitions are bad and can disorient the people. Also, when you cling to the tradition and keep not only the good, but also the bad stuff from it you gain nothing.But then the film cancels itself by proving the supertitions "bad" guys right that they wanted to sacrifice someone for an old cult! And it wasn't some major plot twist or anything close to that. The only reason that the creators did it that I can think of is to make the movie more appealing to the masses. It really is a shame because with some alternate last five minutes this movie would be way better and definitely more clever.

-All the horror parts wernt scary , no suspense
-The comedy wasn't funny, was there supposed to be ?-The acting was just over the top and bad
-Dialogue was just awful , nobody talks like that
-They tried to make the blonde girl a bad ass , but it just came across as cringe and forced.The story was a complete mess , I could go on and on-Please Don't waste your time with this!

Thriller movie. Good movie.
But expected more from the poster where Samara was holding a rifle. Thought she might start killing her in laws when she picks up the gun.
But its just survival story.

Ready or Not is a deranged black comedy that wears its wild-eyed craziness proudly. And the story is set up with a cinematic glossiness, an old-school gleam that matches the well-polished woods and marble of its mansion setting. Star Samara Weaving certainly comes through in her young-bride-turned-terrified-scrapper role with movie star charisma to spare.
Amazing film with absolutely great performances all around. Sam Weaving is a scream queen in the making. The laughs and gore were fun in equal measure and everything balanced out perfectly.

This was the worst movie I have seen in a long time. I found myself fast forwarding through most of it. The plot was dry and lackluster at best. This is one of the movies that you find yourself waiting and waiting for something significant to happen, but find very little release with a very anti-climatic finish. I just couldn't wait for it to be over.
A different take on the hunter/hunted trope. Overall a good quality dark comedy horror.
Simple and gory, everything you want from a film like this, bravo

I didn't know what to expect from this movie, I hadn't heard much about it. The trailer reminded me of Get Out, so my hubby and I gave it a shot. We both really enjoyed it! It was a fun entertaining flick that doesn't take it self too seriously.The acting, dialogue, horror and comedy are all on point. I don't understand the low score reviews, it's not meant to be a realistic movie it's a comedy/horror. Samara Weaving is brilliant in her role as Grace. Adam Brody is great as the drunken sarcastic brother. A nice distraction from iso-life.

GREAT horror, comedy... loved it. Reminded me of something like the original Texas Chainsaw where it had lots of comedy, gore and suspense. My type of film. Mostly great acting especially from lead actress. Lots of fun and found myself saying "yuck" lots of time. I would watch this again.

Review title: If you like a plotless movie with lots of yelling
Review_body: Do you like movies with an extremely basic plot? Lots of " being yelled? Well this is the movie for you! But for real, it was hardly even entertaining. All they do is chase each other around, and do dumb stuff to miss each other. Go watch grass grow instead.

Review title: I just watched this. Very confused as to why all the bad reviews.
Review_body: I really enjoyed this movie. It was fast paced and very original. The only think I can think of for the bad reviews is that it is listed as a comedy/horror/thriller and I didn't see any comedic parts at all.

Review title: I even liked it, & I don't like dark comedies!
Review_body: I don't like dark comedies, BUT I thoroughly enjoyed this film. Funny. Well scripted. Well acted. Loved the ending. Even people that don't like dark comedies will enjoy this one lol.
Very good plot, scenes, direction, overall it's so cool to watch. Don't miss this one.

The positive aspect of this movie that i really like is acting by Samara weaving.
Overall movie is decent
When movies like this make it to the big screen and can entertain people with the killings and story-line, it makes me become very concerned about the state of our world. This movie was terrible.
The premise is idiotic and the logic of these peaople is off the wall but it was fun, the gore is pretty good but if you want to enjoy it you can't think about it at all .

Awful movie
The bride is annoyingly clumsy
And the "Rich are evil" vibe in every Hollywood movie nowadays is wasted.
The movie has terrible inconsistencies.
Nice try.
Gave it 2/10 because I'm kind.

I went into this movie with low expectations and was really surprised! It didn't take itself too seriously and I enjoyed the fact that there wasn't a lot of down time. The comedy was just the right amount for a thriller/horror. Would recommend for anyone that enjoys light hearted horror/thrillers.
Fun horror movie.Hits all the correct notes.Nothing special.Lots of fun.
Loved this movie except climax..nail biting scenes a lot.. Horror and humour mixed well.. Samara acting and smile are too good.
I don't understand why so many people have given this a rating other than 1 or 2. The movies plot is just idiotic and is a stupid film that glorifies death and violence. Utter garbage.
We really loved this movie. I wouldn't say it was scary but more of a dark comedy. The movie was interesting and entertaining to watch.

In a world full of dodgy teenage angst horror, sick horror that goes too far, it's rare to find that genius that blends horror and comedy together in the perfect formula.This is not a movie for fans of rubbish like Us, The Babadok, and Paranormal whatever 10This is a film for fans of the original Army of Darkness, Bad Taste, Braid Dead and Dog SoldiersWhilst not reaching the lofty heights of those films is tickles the same funny bones and has the same blend of daft OTT gore with tongue firmly in cheek.Brilliant

Review title: One of The Best Horror Thriller
Review_body: In my opinion, although in this film there are some scenes that are not too tense, because they are filled with dark comedy, but overall these scenes always give the impression of a climax from beginning to end.

This movie is weird. And funny. And probably in other times would have never made it in Hollywood. But it was made and we should be forever grateful. It's all the best qualities of a "most dangerous game" story, but if you had to do the hunting. And like really Karen? Are you going to really practice using that crossbow, or will you Google it?Explore some deeper layers into what I can only imagine is true life of the 1% and then also watch some blood splatter on a pretty white dress, that this woman will truly never wear again.

Review title: A fun horror-comedy to watch on a Saturday evening
Review_body:
First of all, the movie was a blast to watch. Even though it wasn't quite scary to me, it certainly managed to be funny and tense at times.
And also, the acting -- it was phenomenal. Especially by Samara Weaving, who was really charming in her own way.
It's really rewatchable and I can already imagine seeing it again with my friends. Go see it!

Review title: Not a horror movie, not a comedy, but entertaining
Review_body:
I'm not gonna say it was a bad movie, cause the movie entertains you and the movie with unique story can't be bad.
I even loved the ending, the kind of end expected for such stupid tradition and family.
But the movie doesn't deserve to be counted as a horror movie but a pretty much cruel one.
I think this movie had a way too much violence even for kind of genre.
I entertained but I neither laughed or scared.

Review title: I went in expecting something like 'You're Next'.
Review_body: What I got was a very dry dark comedy that just basically gives up at the end (and wastes kills). As a hardcore slasher fan, I went in looking for some decent kills, and maybe a decent survivor girl, but you get none of that with this. I can't even remember one single kill. It was just a bunch of offscreen stuff and quick shots of aftermath gore.If you're a slasher fan looking for some good kills, skip this one, it's not made for you.

Review title: ...we're editing this with a makeshift ending.
Review_body: This movie sucks so much. It's about time the production gave up on the 9 - 10 reviews.Come back with a proper ending, proper onscreen kills, and PRACTICAL effects. And then, and only then, you might be able to look upon Erin from You're Next and not feel shame in your heart.
I thought it was funny and ridiculous but enjoyable can't be taken seriously to give a bad review. Some films are so bad they're great!

Review title: Not as bad as the 1&2s lead you to believe
Review_body: Anyone rating this movie a 1 or 2 probs my only watches 5-10 movies a year. I've watched over 100 this year and can say that this one isn't bad. It's a fun Dark comedy Thriller. Easily a 6-8 depending on preference

This was probably my favorite movie of 2019, along with Us. This was an awesome horror film with an original plot (I think). It also had a very good balance of humor and horror. It's very rare to find a good movie like this where the humor is balanced out perfectly with the horror. The only other movie I can think of like this is The Cabin In The Woods. The only reason I did not give this a 10/10 is because some characters make extremely stupid decisions like the maid in the dumbwaiter who presses the button and closes it on her neck. But besides that I can't think of any other negative for this film. I've watched this movie like 4 times and loved every second of it. I highly recommend you watch this movie, you'll probably have a fun time

It was a good movie. It must represent a thriller, but there is also a lot of comedy. Shocking scenes were little. Some scenes are really funny. Good acting and nice music. I was just expecting more "wow" moments.

Definitely wasn't the best, but it's worth the watch. A unique plot with a predictable yet unexplained ending. The movie is consistently interesting with a few comedic elements as well. Perfect for anyone who likes a good laugh during a thriller!

Review title: Just when I lost my faith in the movies ....
Review_body: Please don't believe the bad reviews, maybe they didn't watch the same movie I did. I can understand it's not everybody's cup of tea, but it's really entertaining and worth the watch. If you don't like a horror movie that don't take it self to seriously, gore, cringe moments, black humor or great acting then don't watch it, at least that will keep the overall rating up.

Review title: Holds the power to become a classic and one of my favourites
Review_body: Really fun to watch, and really good twist in the end. I've been recommending it to everyone.

Review title: the ending ruined the whole thing (for me)
Review_body:
I would have preferred the "magic doesn't exist and everyone's a dumdum" ending, but got the polar opposite.
Despite this I can see why some people found it hilarious

This is one of those movies where you don't know what's round the corner, what's about to happen. Are the family going to win the deadly game of hide and seek or will the family fail to make the cut on there deadly deal with a dead man.
This movies starts ok then descended into non sense. There no good plot and the acting was not good. I was deceived by the good reviews and watched it. I warned you.

Review title: Fun Comedy With A Dash Of Gore
Review_body: Sit back, relax and enjoy a funny, comedic, occasionally gory movie that wasn't made with a cookie cutter. It was never conceived to be the next "Schindler's List," have fun and enjoy it for what it is.
I did not expect the ending. Every scene was unpredictable but I feel double awkward about the double twist ending. By the way, the family deserves it but Daniel is the least.
I love the creative, weird concept. I wouldn't say it was a comedy but there were some funny parts. Characters were smart and it was definitely entertaining.

Review title: I have never laughed so much during a horror
Review_body: I loved this movie! A dark comedy that actually delivers scares and laughs is really hard to find. Samara Weaving is perfect and the ending of this movie was AMAZING! Must watch.I always recommend this movie to people

Review title: A creative take on gory horrors
Review_body:
What makes ready or not so different to most gory horrors is that it uses these scenes as a way to make the viewer more tense and scare them more as if it's like something bad will happen and then calming you with some black comedy.
Overall ready or not is a fun film that is a horror easy to watch without being scared as much.
This is really really good and someone should make sure they will still make movies like this in the future.The music was absolutely amazing.Highly recommended.

It 's really awesome watch it you 'll really like it
Genre:- Thriller , Comedy , suspense.
Mind Blowing concept.
rating :- 9/10

Review title: Fun and entertaining one time watch
Review_body: With a runtime of 95 min, Ready or Not tells a story of a ritual game night where the whole family is running behind the bride.Plot is unique and some scenes are refreshing.It's a mixture of funny and dark. But at places it also touches on deeper human emotions of right and wrong.Ending is good.It's a good one time watch, especially after a long day of work when you don't want to think anything in the movie or emotionally get involved in it.6 starts because of some logical loopholes and some illogical character development.

Review title: it's fun but the ending is just
Review_body: It's fun but the ending is incomplete.They seemed to be changing the ending all the time.Up until the ending it was interesting.But blowing ppl up? Really? Utterly lame. They should have been melted down and suffering before their demise. Big miss there.Other than that it was interesting; the set up really excellent. Again the ending was just a tug of war. I didn't get her saying, "we're divorced." and doubt anyone did.
Funnier than scary but not very funny. Lots of talent wasted. What were they thinking?
Horror? More like unintentional comedy that's full of nonsensical plot holes. It just makes no sense. The most stupid crap I've ever seen

Review title: Spiritual sequel to Cabin in the Woods
Review_body: While I was watching the movie I couldn't help but think of another movie that did the horror/comedy/cliché so perfectly. This movie looks and feels a lot like Cabin in the Woods (2011) by Drew Goddard. This movie is excellent too. Maybe not quite as good as Cabin but not far behind. Can't wait for the Blu-ray to do a double feature of the two movies.
I'v seen a lot of bad movie, but this one of the worst
Such a fresh take on horror. It was fun, funny, and bloody. Perfect storm! Ignore the people giving it a low rating.

I went into this with decent expectations, having really enjoyed "You're Next", what seemed like a similarly themed damsel in distress turned badass locked in a home. Unfortunately this one turned into more of a mess than I'd care to revisit. The humor was there, but the shock factors they were going for missed widely. The horror wasn't scary either, all in a disappointment. *Adam Brody was the saving grace of this flick, loved him*

Review title: A fun little horror thriller you shouldn't miss
Review_body: By far, this movie stands out as an entertaining, easy to digest flick. Like a roller coaster, it takes turns and loops that you the viewer aren't ready for but love all the same. The tone of the movie is fluent throughout and when balancing horror with elements of comedy, tone is sometimes hard to manage. The cast is great, which is needed to drive this straight forward movie. If you Like Samara weaving from the babysitter and Adam Brody (who doesn't?), you will enjoy this movie.
Meant to be fun but only if you're a simpleton. Lacking in ideas and acting skills. Poor

Review title: A lot of blood mixed with some laughs.
Review_body: I loved it! Obviously not the best movie of all times, by the look of my rating, BUT : it was awsome! Highly recommended. Nice environment, lots of blood, some nailbiting and frankly a very good job done by the actors, make up, producers, writers, scene crew and everybody who was involved in this one! I salute you! Hail yourselfs and megustalations!

Review title: Don't listen to the negative reviews
Review_body: This movie was very well paced, had a great soundtrack, and was acted to perfection. The atmosphere was wonderful, and you actually at times felt like you were there.This movie is dark humor at its finest, and it even has a few twists and turns along the way. The ending is one of the most satisfying endings I've seen in a long time for a horror film.I don't understand the negative reviews, if you like dark humor, you will love this film.

Review title: Good watch but could have been great..
Review_body:
I was expecting more with this movie.. was vey much impressed by the trailer, waited so much for the movie. I thought this movie would be the level that of "don't breathe" but its not...
Still its a easily a one time watch movie...

Review title: Ready or not to be entertained!
Review_body:
One of the most entertaining / fun movies I've seen in a long time.
DON'T WATCH ALL THE TRAILER! After the game starts in the trailer it spoils a lot of the movie.

Spoiler Free: I avoided anything to do with this movie based on what I had heard. hide and seek with weird family. Felt weird and one of those dumb 'Truth or Dare' type movies. But it's so much more. It felt more akin to You're Next, one of my favorite horror movies of the past decade. Samara Weaving and Adam Brody are great. All the other actors feel believable but also are sorta cartoonish? There's as believable as you can imagine someone could be in that situation. Good camera work. And for a movie set mostly at night, it is never too dark.Spoilers- the little Satan twist was neat, although personally I would've liked a little more ambiguity in it. It was fun, but the whole exploding and then seeing the dude in the flame just felt like a bit much all at once, but that's more my preference to leaving it more open-ended as opposed to a critique. Samara Weaving is just fantastic. Really sells the emotion of someone stuck in this situation. I think maybe she's a bit too quipy and I would've preferred if the comedy came mostly from the family, but still great emotions on display. Adam Brody is great. Steals every scene he's in honestly. He's either hilarious or giving such a good performance. At first I was upset he died like that, but it was better than having to see the one sympathetic person in the family die like that. I think it was fairly obvious that Alex was gonna flip on Grace eventually. It was either that or die. I'm glad it was after his mother had died and not like 'ooh i tricked you, I'm gonna kill you because I'm evil.' The mom is fine, nothing great but nothing bad either. It was great seeing the Dad become more and more unraveled as the night progressed. The sister and her husband feel the most outlandish but it works more than it fails. Aunt was creepy but I wish we spent more time on the backstory of her. I felt like maybe 5 more minutes or so to establish more of her backstory could've added a lot more depth to the character. Butler and maids are there to add to the kills. And they do not shy away from the kills. Blood and gore galore. But it's mostly played for laughs? There's really only like one or two scenes that are like hard to watch. It's fun throughout, mostly because of the acting. It's more of a horror comedy(?) but like horror/thriller first, comedy second. Think more Scream or You're Next as oppose to like Seed of Chucky or Scary Movie. Watch it. Support original films. Even if it's now owned by Disney.
The only good thing about the movie is Samara Weaving, who nails it as a badass bride. Hopefully we shall be seeing a lot more of her now. Rest is all substandard, low budget material.
A poor attemp to look a like "Knives out" mixed with "The Hunt". The plot it's incredible and absurd even for a fictional history.

Basically 1.5 hours of good, bloody fun that doesn't require a lot of thinking. It was exactly what I was in the mood for on a Thursday night. The ending is definitely strange and your either going to love it or hate it.

Put it on your top list worst movies of 2019. This movie is full of shit actions that doesn't make any sense in real life. You know from the start what will happen. Just a wrong comedy nothing more. The music is good I have to admit, but you could use YouTube for that instead, not worth the time to watch the whole movie.

If you didn't have fun watching this movie, then you're looking at it the wrong way. It's supposed to be silly. For horror/thriller/B-movie fans, this was a gold mine. The concept was refreshing. If you're not smiling at the end of the movie, then this genre isn't for you.

My family thought it was a really fun, semi-gore comedy thriller movie. We enjoyed some laughs and a few cringes. I thought the story was pretty original. Overall it was a pretty solid movie with a great cast.

Review title: Don't watch it with your in laws
Review_body: We may hear a lot of criticism about this movie, depending on the choice of the viewer but looking it as a movie, it had great performances, really great tension, weirdass ending I didn't expect and god the violence, the lead actress is phenomenal and so is the character of Daniel who is the grounded one between these lunatics. What I liked about this movie was how it didn't take itself too seriously or lightly, dark and cramped spaces were handled quite beautifully and direction was on point, I really liked this movies, there might be many flaws I can find but considering how much I enjoyed it I will neglect all of them.

After watching the trailer i highly anticipated watching this film, but to be honest i kept my expectations low for (2) reasons. 1) the sheer lack of good horrors this year and 2) after reading the reviews here. This movie was a fun ride. The characters were developed quickly so you immediately knew who to hate, who to laugh at and who to love and there was enough mystery about some characters to not know how to feel about them. This movie also had the perfect amount of action, gore, intensity & comedy. I recommend watching it, you wont feel robbed out of time or $$.

Review title: Samara, the only thing i liked in this movie
Review_body: WTF, What is this sick and disgusting family, I did not like anyone act but Samara. She is smart in fighting scenes and funny. i merged with her, but the rest of the actors felt bored and disgusted ..

Review title: Starts well, ends very badly. Waste of time.
Review_body: Starts very well. Interesting plot with few funny scenes, dark comedy done right, nice cast choices BUT it was all just was a waste of time. I was really expecting for the bride to go full bride (kill bill). It ends with everybody just blow up really? Could she not just kill almost all of them one by one throughout the movie so it could add a few nice action packed scenes? If they wanted to be gruesome as they seem to want, they could have a few (brutal) fight scenes but NO. They had to make me wait for a stupid ending. nothing really mattered in the end. Very lazy screenplay

Review title: What was the film trying to be
Review_body: I went into this film open minded and I was interested how the film was going to play out. The film started off well but after the first 20 minutes it went real stupid real fast, there was no suspense or horror elements to the film, such the lead actress was cool but that was the only good thing about this movie. What a huge letdown.

Now this is how you create comedy and horror. I would recommend this movie to anyone looking for a good movie. Great acting, great story line and overall just a funny movie. It has been a while since I found a movie this good.

Review title: The script is the comedic relief
Review_body: What a clever spin on the short story, the game. A classic tale of hide and seek and murder. I had low expectations when I watched it thinking it would be cheesy, but it was just the right amount of cheesy. The language of the script seemed "realistic" where as if you were in the protagonists shoes you'd be thinking and saying the same thing. While I would categorize this movie as Horror/thriller it was also very fun to watch. It had you sitting on the edge of your seat whilst laughing. Very well done highly recommend.

This is a comedy/horror hybrid that pokes fun at a lot of the common themes and quirks of modern horror movies. If you really thought the idea of a deadly game of hide and seek on your wedding night is going to be groundbreaking horror, im not sure I can take your assessment of film seriously..It was more funny than it was scary, I wouldn't say you would expect the end as its pretty odd. Overall this was a good popcorn movie, if you like going to the movies in general this is pure entertainment and requires nothing of you in return.

Review_body: This is currently on a 7.2 rating and I honestly don't know how it's over a 3... This film is terrible! Absolutely laughable!

-There is nothing new about the story line, but still fun to watch though.
-Not much jump scared (which is good)
-Samara Weaving is the best!
